name: Mega Tank Thearchy
description:
You are going to be playing this game as an expert driver. Your aim during the game play should be to Crush all the cars. The treacherous tracks in the game will make driving the biggest challenge of your career.The tracks are full of obstacles that will make the Drive really difficult. You have to be daring enough to Drive your Mega Tank and crush all the Cars and knock out all your missions.
* Fantastic graphics
* Precise physics simulation
* Thrilling gameplay
* Easy controls
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
